term.title: Michaelis constant

item.text: Substance concentration of substrate at which the rate of reaction is equal to one half of the limiting rate (maximum rate).

notes.item: The Michaelis constant (Michaelis concentration) may be used only when Michaelis–Menten kinetics is obeyed.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 957. 'Glossary of terms in quantities and units in Clinical Chemistry (IUPAC-IFCC Recommendations 1996)' on page 981 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668040957)
